StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Efficiently utilize the skills acquired through 1+ Years of work experience in SAP End user, Support in Implementation Projects from a reputed company. I want to grow progressively in the field of SAP Functional * Understanding on procure to pay cycle * Global settings: Material type, material group, number range assignment. * Master data: Material Master Data, Vendor material data creation, Info record creation, source list. * Configuring of PR, RFQ, PO, outline agreements and Release Strategy for PR, RFQ, PO, outline agreements. * Configuring release procedure for PR and PO with classification. * Knowledge on SAP standard procurement process like procurement direct material, consumable material, services. * Special Procurement process for subcontracting, Consignment, Pipeline materials and Stock Transfer. * Inventory management process (Goods Receipts, Goods Issues, Stock Transfers and Transfer Postings). * Integration of FI-MM functional Modules of a Business Module.

PositionHistory.Title: SAP MM Trainee
PositionHistory.Description:
Brief: Implementation project
Job Responsibilities * Involved in design, configuration, testing and re-engineering of various functionalities in MM modules. * Involved in defining Requirements, Configuration, Integration, testing and training to end user.. * Created Material master records, functional location, equipment using SAP LTMC. * BOM Creation According to material and maintained Master recepie. * Configured Vendor/Customer Master Data and Create Bank Key and maintain in BP. * Involved in the Integration of SAP FI-MM Modules * Prepared User manual documents for transaction code used by key and super users. * Involved actively with Cross-Functional team members to solve some production issues. * Create New GL Account, Asset Creation. * Investigate repetitive issues and take necessary remedial action * Preparation of CAPA document

JobCategory.Comments: Hardware Engineering describes 29% of this job
